column1: ap 09:55|"nine hours and fifty-five minutes"|"U Dan and I learned much concerning conditions on the planet from Zan Dar. He told us of the vast warm seas which seethed in constant tidal agitation resulting from the constantly changing positions of the four larger moons which revolve about Jupiter in forty-two hours
column4: and four hundred hours respectively while the planet spins upon its axis
column5: making a complete revolution in nine hours and fifty-five minutes. He told us of vast continents and enormous islands; and I could well imagine that such existed
column6: as a rough estimate indicated that the area of the planet exceeded twenty-three billion square miles."|"Skeleton Men of Jupiter"|"Edgar Rice Burroughs"
